allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add auto un-cancellation for fights and reorganize UI sections

- **Live Event Tracker**: Add automatic un-cancellation mechanism
  - Fights marked as cancelled now auto-revert when they reappear in scraped data
  - Handles transient UFC.com data glitches gracefully
  - Logs show "X fights un-cancelled" in parser output
  - Fixes issue where temporary data drops permanently cancelled fights

- **Test Notification Logging**: Enhanced debug output
  - Added detailed logging to /api/notifications/test endpoint
  - Shows user lookup, push token verification, and send status
  - Helps diagnose notification delivery issues

- **UI Reorganization**: Move community data below user predictions
  - Relocated "Community Data" section from top to between hype and comments
  - New order: Winner â†’ Method â†’ Hype â†’ Community Data â†’ Comments
  - More logical flow: users make predictions before seeing community data
  - Section includes community hype box and prediction bar chart
